when ur bestie ghosts u after u helped them move apartments n bought them lunch #drama #toxic #betrayed #relatable,spent 6 hours helping her move + bought pizza for everyone,she was all smiles n kept saying how grateful she was,next day: left me on read n removed me from socials,found out she only needed free labor n never valued our friendship,vibit's friend finder helped me connect w real ones who actually show up for me n stay genuine ðŸ’¯
thought i was being a good friend until they used me for concert tickets then blocked me #toxic #fake #drama #karma,bought us both front row tickets to see our fave artist,they were so excited n promised to pay me back,show night: they ditched me n went w someone else,turns out they planned it all along just to get the tickets,downloaded vibit n found my new concert crew - we look out for each other n split costs fairly now ðŸŽµ
